cxro.common.device.camera

Interface Camera

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCamera, Pixis, PixisProxy

    public interface Camera
    Author:
    William Cork

    Copyright (c) 2013 Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods

      boolean cameraSettings(boolean captureMode, long exposureTime, int x0, int x1, int y0, int y1)
      Camera setup for a capture.
      boolean checkStatus()
      Deprecated. 
      This method can be replaced by using getImage and testing for null.

    • Method Detail

      • initCamera

        boolean initCamera(int index)
        Initializes this camera object to the indexed camera. Once paired with the given index, this object controls that camera via the remaining methods in this class.
        Parameters:
        index -
        Returns:
        true if init sequence succeeded otherwise, false

      • uninitCamera

        boolean uninitCamera()
        Disconnects class from the camera at the index designated in initCamera
        Returns:
        Status of the uninit

      • isInitialized

        boolean isInitialized()
        The initialization status of the camera. Unnecessary if initCamera returned true.
        Returns:
        True if the camera is initialized

      • getSensorSize

        int[] getSensorSize()
             throws java.io.IOException
        Gives the sensor size of the camera in a formatted array. And integer array with the formatting [width, height]
        Returns:
        int[] {Horizontal size, Vertical size}
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when a communication error has occurred.

      • checkStatus

        @Deprecated
boolean checkStatus()
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Deprecated. This method can be replaced by using getImage and testing for null.
        Returns the status of the local image buffer.
        Returns:
        true if local image buffer has an image. false if no image has been obtained.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when a communication error has occurred.

      • getImage

        byte[] getImage()
         throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the latest image in the buffer.
        Returns:
        The latest image. If no image is in the buffer, null is returned.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when a communication error has occurred.

      • cameraSettings

        boolean cameraSettings(boolean captureMode,
                       long exposureTime,
                       int x0,
                       int x1,
                       int y0,
                       int y1)
        Camera setup for a capture.

        Parameters:
        captureMode - Modifies the camera to use single or continuous capture mode.
        exposureTime - The exposure time per image.
        x0 - The starting horizontal corner of an image region
        x1 - The ending horizontal corner of an image region.
        y0 - The starting vertical corner of an image region
        y1 - The ending vertical corner of an image region
        Returns:
        true if settings were set correctly, false otherwise.

      • getCaptureMode

        boolean getCaptureMode()
        Returns the current capture mode of the camera.
        Returns:
        true if the camera is in continuous capture mode. false if the camera is in single capture mode.

      • startCapture

        boolean startCapture()
        Begins image acquisition. cameraSetting should be called before beginning to capture images.
        Returns:
        true if the capture has started correctly. False otherwise.

      • stopCapture

        boolean stopCapture()
        Stops the image capture sequence.
        Returns:
        True if the camera has stopped correctly. False, otherwise.

      • getError

        java.lang.String getError()
        Returns the lest error on the camera.
        Returns:
        A string containing the last error.
